name: Wheee!
reviewBody: I watched this, and watched this, and watched this repeatedly. My best friend's mother bought three copies of it, one for her and one for each of her daughters, so I watched it over there. And in all technicality, even though I love the music, I LOVED the brass section more! They are so entertaining! They danced, and played their instruments, and sang away from the mic's more often than not, but danced and kept the audience entertained...when they noticed. They were pretty much all I watched when they were on screen. :) IT WAS GREAT! And I've seen the cut and uncut versions, so I know what the full concert looked like, and it was GREAT!!!! WHEEEE!!
